original_title: Lohan Ratwatte appointed Minister of Plantation, Mahaweli
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Lohan Ratwatte has been appointed as Sri Lanka’s State Minister of Plantation Industries and Mahaweli Development.
Ratwatte was sworn in before President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the Presidential Secretariat on Monday, a statement by his media division announced. (Colombo/Jan29/2024)
